sect1.title: Architecture
sect1.para: The Wolframe standard client wolfclient is a thin client which executes XML requests via the Wolframe protocol and presents XML answers. It is written in Qt and is cross-platform. Qt is currently available on http://doc.qt.digia.com/qt/index.html. User interfaces for wolfclient are defined as a set of forms using standard Qt widgets and are if ever possible defined using the Qt Interface Designer (see http://qt-project.org/doc/qt-4.8/designer-manual.html).
